mapper.select: SELECT O.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, O.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, O.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, O.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, O.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_o O where 1 = 1 and O.STATUS = 'Y' and O.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and O.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT O300.ATTR1 AS type, O300.ATTR2 AS subtype, O300.ATTR6 AS realizedFlag, O300.BEGIN_BALANCE_CNY AS beginBalance, O300.DR_AMOUNT_CNY AS drAmount, O300.CR_AMOUNT_CNY AS crAmount FROM wp_o300 O300 WHERE 1 = 1 AND O300. STATUS = 'Y' AND O300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT O310D.ITEM as item, O310D.SUB_ITEM as subItem, O310D.AMOUNT as amount, O310D.TAX_RATE as taxRate FROM wp_o310_detail O310D WHERE 1 = 1 AND O310D. STATUS = 'Y' AND O310D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O310D.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT O310S.ITEM as item, O310S.SUB_ITEM as subItem, O310S.AMOUNT as amount, O310S.TAX_RATE as taxRate, O310S.TAX_CLIENT as taxClient FROM wp_o310_summary O310S WHERE 1 = 1 AND O310S. STATUS = 'Y' AND O310S.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O310S.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT O310E.ITEM as item, O310E.TAX_RATE as taxRate, O310E.TAX_CLIENT as taxClient FROM wp_o310_extra O310E WHERE 1 = 1 AND O310E. STATUS = 'Y' AND O310E.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O310E.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT O311S.TAXABLE_AMOUNT AS taxableAmount, O311S.NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT AS nonTaxableAmount FROM wp_o311_summary O311S WHERE 1 = 1 AND O311S. STATUS = 'Y' AND O311S.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O311S.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT O311D.ACCOUNT_NUM AS accountNum, O311D.ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, O311D.ATTR6 AS vatFlag, O311D.AMOUNT as amount FROM wp_o311_detail O311D WHERE 1 = 1 AND O311D. STATUS = 'Y' AND O311D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND O311D.PERIOD = #{period}
